name: Peni Parker

abilities.name: Web Shot (Suit)
abilities.details: Fires electrified webs from the SP//dr suit.

abilities.name: SP//dr Dash (Suit)
abilities.details: Performs a quick dash, dealing minor damage to enemies hit.

abilities.name: Sync Rate (Suit)
abilities.details: Temporarily boosts SP//dr's attack speed and damage for ~4 seconds.

abilities.name: Tranquilizer Dart (Pilot)
abilities.details: Fires a short-range dart that briefly slows enemies.

abilities.name: Call Mech (Pilot)
abilities.details: Begins calling down a new SP//dr suit using stored Ultimate charge.

ultimate.name: Eject / Mech Recall
ultimate.effect: Builds charge over time. Pilot: Calls down SP//dr instantly dealing landing damage. Suit: Ejects Peni when suit health is low, dealing AoE damage.

passives.name: SP//dr Suit
passives.details: Peni pilots the SP//dr mech with its own health. When destroyed, Peni ejects. Gains Ult charge passively.

passives.name: Wall Crawl (Suit)
passives.details: SP//dr suit can crawl on walls and ceilings.

lore: From Earth-14512, Peni Parker is a young student who pilots the SP//dr suit, powered by a radioactive spider that shares a psychic link with her. She fights crime alongside her unique mech.
